result.title: Report on European IP laws for audio branding context
result.description: A comprehensive survey about cunrrent IP laws is produced to provide a clear idea of their respective objectives and modifications and how they affect the audio branding sector and its production processes. Gathered information and conclusions are transferred into recommendations which have to be taken into account for (novel) branding services and business models.

result.title: D3.3. The Final METRO-HAUL node architecture and optical solutions
result.description: D3.3 gives a complete overview of METRO-HAUL vision for metro node architecture, multi-vendor and disaggregated scenarios, interconnection, transmission and switching solutions in different network architectures. It also includes a comprehensive description of the METRO-HAUL node control and management environment. Lessons learnt and feedback from WP5 on demonstration activities is included with a discussion of short/medium and long term solution maturity (All Tasks).
